title: Google Creating Their Own SoC? What Are the Benefits of an EV Pickup Truck?
description:
This week, we give our final goodbye to LG Mobile, discuss several Pixel rumors and their potential new Google-made SoC, before debating where the EV pickup truck world is headed with a few significant recent announcements. Finally, we wrap everything up with a listener Q & A.
